NK010(tha)028:0: phur pa rgyud lugs las bskyed rim gyi dogs sel dka' gnad mdud 'grol bzhugs /
NK010(tha)028:1: 'dus ma byas pa'i rdo rje ni //
NK010(tha)028:2: chos nyid rang bzhin phur bu ste //
NK010(tha)028:3: yongs grub don dam bden pa'i zhal //
NK010(tha)028:4: dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nur 'dud //
NK010(tha)028:5: gsang sngags gsar rnying mdo mthun par dkyil 'khor gyi
NK010(tha)028:6: cho ga dang sgrub thabs gnyis su phye ba'i dang
NK010(tha)028:7: pos sa chog phyi nang gsang gsum gyi mtshams gcod
NK010(tha)028:9: dkyil 'khor 'du bya ba'i las rim sogs tshang la ma nor ba ston pa yin pas /
NK010(tha)028:10: 'dir yang dbang gi cho ga dngos grub rgya mtsho'i 'jug ngogs ltar shes par bya zhing /
NK010(tha)028:11: 'on kyang gnas kyi mtshan nyid sogs bya ba'i gseb
NK010(tha)028:12: tshags 'ga' zhig bsnyen sgrub thams cad kyi mdzod khang
NK010(tha)028:13: las shes par byas na sgrub khog tu ming btags
NK010(tha)028:14: pa'i lag len zur pa mi dgos la /
NK010(tha)028:15: de bzhin du sa chog la gdon bgegs gzir ba'i
NK010(tha)028:16: slad du khro bo bcu'i stangs stabs dang phyag rgya
NK010(tha)028:17: dmigs bsal rgyud nas bshad pa sgrub thabs su bsdebs
NK010(tha)028:19: de las gzhan pa phur pa'i rgyud sde las bshad
NK010(tha)028:20: pa ma mthong yang sngon gyi bla ma dam pa
NK010(tha)028:21: rnams kyis srol btod pa nyid du rig par byas
NK010(tha)028:22: nas gsang sngags kyi don po dbang dang bskyed rim
NK010(tha)028:23: rdzogs rim dang bshad pa ste /
NK010(tha)028:24: snga 'gyur bka' babs kyi chu bo bzhi'i rgyun la
NK010(tha)028:25: 'dris par byas na byin rlabs che zhing dngos grub
NK010(tha)028:27: deng sang gsang sngags gzugs brnyan du lhung bas phyag
NK010(tha)028:28: rgya dam rgya chos rgya phyag rgya chen po bzhi'i
NK010(tha)028:29: mtshan nyid kyang rna lam du ma son bzhin du
NK010(tha)028:30: rdo rje 'dzin par snyems pas gang ba'i phyir ro
NK010(tha)028:31: // lar gsang sngags ni don zab cing dbyings che
NK010(tha)028:32: bas dbang rtul rnams la ye gsang chen por gyur
NK010(tha)028:33: par ma zad deng gi dus gsang sngags mos pas
NK010(tha)028:34: spyod pa'i skabs yin yang dam tshig dag pa rnams
NK010(tha)028:35: la thun mong gi dngos grub mthong chos su gyur
NK010(tha)028:36: pas dam tshig kho na la brtson pa gzhir bzhag
NK010(tha)028:38: de las 'dir mngon rtogs kyi dka' sa nas 'dri ba'i cha la /
NK010(tha)028:39: khro bo 'chol ba'i mtshams kyi dus //
NK010(tha)028:40: bsgrub pa'i ye shes tshon gang po //
NK010(tha)028:41: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don /
NK010(tha)028:42: rang yi dam du gsal ba'i thugs ka nas h+aum
NK010(tha)028:43: yig tshon gang ba dpag tu med par spros pa'i
NK010(tha)028:44: rang sgras stong gsum thams cad rdzus skyes kyi khro
NK010(tha)028:45: bos gang / de thams cad kyang zhi bas mi
NK010(tha)028:46: thul ba'i gdon bgegs la shin tu khros pa'i tshul
NK010(tha)028:47: dang ldan pas na thugs la 'bar ba'i srog kyang
NK010(tha)028:48: zhugs zhes drag po'i mngon brjod dang /
NK010(tha)028:49: dbu rgyan ni ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid phyir rang bsrung dang /
NK010(tha)028:50: nyi zla ri rab phur pa la sogs gzhan sde tshar gcod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
NK010(tha)028:51: de las mtshon cha 'chol ba'i mtshams la /
NK010(tha)028:52: rdo rje rab tu k+ai la ya //
NK010(tha)028:54: phyag mtshan gyi phur ba 'dril zhing gsor bas de las phur bu mang po spros /
NK010(tha)028:55: gnod byed rnams kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad tshar bcad pas 'khor ba myang 'das su bsgral /
NK010(tha)028:56: de'ang bdag rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK010(tha)028:57: mtshan ma rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK010(tha)028:58: phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsum ldan gyi byang
NK010(tha)028:59: chub sems las kyang 'phros pas gzugs can rnams kyi
NK010(tha)028:60: phung po rdul phran du gshigs pa'i sha khrag khams
NK010(tha)028:61: gsum du 'thor / gzugs bral rnams kyi ming bzhi'i
NK010(tha)028:62: phung po h+aum dang phata kyis gtor nas ye shes
NK010(tha)028:63: kyi rdo rje tshon gang ba dang /
NK010(tha)028:64: chos nyid kyi phur bu de 'dra bas stong gsum
NK010(tha)028:65: gang ste khams gsum du 'dzin par bag chags bshigs
NK010(tha)028:66: / de dag 'dus pa las mtshon cha 'chol ba'i gur du gyur par bsam mo //
NK010(tha)028:67: de nas rten gzhal yas khang ni /
NK010(tha)028:68: thig tshon gyis bsgrubs pa'i rnam bcas dmigs rten tsam
NK010(tha)028:69: las bsgom bya ni blos blangs ltar gyi 'dod snam
NK010(tha)028:70: rtsigs pa pha gu la sogs pa phal cher mthun
NK010(tha)028:71: kyang / rtsigs pa nyis rim yod med /
NK010(tha)028:73: dur khrod dang rdo ra go ldog byas min /
NK010(tha)028:78: har sgo dang sgo rgyan sogs ni gsar rnying tsam ma zad /
NK010(tha)028:82: bka' brgyad sogs kyang rgyud sde so so'i rang lugs
NK010(tha)028:83: dang 'brel dgos pa dper na sgyu 'phrul gyi 'og
NK010(tha)028:84: gzhi 'khor los byas pa bzhin dang /
NK010(tha)028:85: de bzhin du phur pa rgyud lugs la ro rlon sogs kyi skyes bur bshad pas mtshon no //
NK010(tha)028:86: gzhal yas khang dngos la'ang rkyang pa dang nyis rim
NK010(tha)028:87: sogs las phur pa'i rgyud kha cig las nyis rim
NK010(tha)028:88: du'ang bshad pas / spros pa can la de ltar rung la /
NK010(tha)028:89: ji ltar yang de'i nang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad
NK010(tha)028:90: ni gdan thabs ma yin pa'i cha nas rtsibs brgyad
NK010(tha)028:91: du smos pa las don la rtsibs bcu dang ldan
NK010(tha)028:92: pa'i tshul / dper na chu btags kyi 'khor lo
NK010(tha)028:93: la gshog pa brgyad du smos pa'i steng 'og gi
NK010(tha)028:94: srog shing shugs la go ba ltar /
NK010(tha)028:95: 'di ni mtshon cha 'khor lo sbubs stong sil snyan
NK010(tha)028:96: kha sbyar ba lta bu yin pas phyogs mtshams su
NK010(tha)028:97: rtsibs brgyad dang / steng 'og tu re re yod pa la h+aum k+aar stobs chen gnyis bzhugs pa'o //
NK010(tha)028:98: gdan bskyed skabs go rim 'dod rgyal du bshad kyang
NK010(tha)028:99: r+au tra dam sri la sogs zhabs 'og tu yod
NK010(tha)028:102: man ngag gab ces pa'i don yang 'di 'dra la dgongs pa yin /
NK010(tha)028:103: de nas lha bskyed pa dngos la gzhan sras dang bdag sras gnyis las /
NK010(tha)028:104: dang po ni sangs rgyas kyi sras su bdag nyid bya ba'i dus /
NK010(tha)028:105: rdo rje sems dpa' stangs dpyal gnas 'gyur las dpal
NK010(tha)028:106: chen he ru kar bzhengs pa la yum gyis glus
NK010(tha)028:107: bskul ba'i tshe / a dang h+aum las rab tu sbyar //
NK010(tha)028:108: zhes pa rkang pa gsum gyi don /
NK010(tha)028:109: a ni skye med yum gyi mkha' //
NK010(tha)028:110: h'u ni 'gag med yab kyi mtshan //
NK010(tha)028:111: de gnyis rol pa chen po'i ngang //
NK010(tha)028:114: yab kyi thugs kar gtad pa'i don //
NK010(tha)028:115: gnyis pa bdag nyid kyi sras su sangs rgyas bya
NK010(tha)028:116: bas 'bras bu'i he ru ka bskyed nas 'khor ba
NK010(tha)028:117: dang rnam pa mthun pa'i mngal 'byin gyis 'khor rnams
NK010(tha)028:119: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
NK010(tha)028:120: ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bsdus te //
NK010(tha)028:121: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don yab yum rjes chags
NK010(tha)028:122: lhag par rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rol mos
NK010(tha)028:123: chos dbyings spros pa dang bral ba'i klong nas de
NK010(tha)028:124: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil
NK010(tha)028:125: 'khor bsdus te sras mchog lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor
NK010(tha)028:126: rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du byas pa thabs shes
NK010(tha)028:127: gnyis ka'i thugs rdo rje dang 'dres pas thugs la
NK010(tha)028:129: de'i tshe srid pa'i 'dod pa rnam par dag pa'i
NK010(tha)028:130: shes rab kyi chas dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes nyams
NK010(tha)028:131: su myong bas / shes rab ma dga' ba'i sgras bstan la /
NK010(tha)028:132: de la kun kyang kun rdzob rgyu'i thig le dang /
NK010(tha)028:133: don dam byang chub kyi sems gnyis 'dres pa las byung bas na /
NK010(tha)028:134: 'dir sprul pa'i bskyed rim la ldan min 'du byed
NK010(tha)028:135: btags yod tsam las grub pa'i byang chub kyi sems
NK010(tha)028:136: kun rdzob pa dang por babs pas yum mkha' rdo
NK010(tha)028:137: rje btsun mo'i gzhal med khang rnam thar gsum gyi
NK010(tha)028:140: gsum pas rlung khams dag pa'i rtog tshogs yi ge'i
NK010(tha)028:141: sprin du shar ba de yang lha'i rnam par grub
NK010(tha)028:142: par bsams la yi ge 'khor lo'i sngags brjod pa'i
NK010(tha)028:143: mthar yum gyi 'dod pa'i sgyu rtsal dang bcas sras
NK010(tha)028:144: 'byin gyi zhu ba glus bskul la /
NK010(tha)028:145: phyag mtshan gyi ngo bo nyid sras mchog rdzas kyi
NK010(tha)028:146: dkyil 'khor rang sngags kyi rkyen las lhun gyis grub
NK010(tha)028:147: par blta ste / de yang dang por chos kyi
NK010(tha)028:148: dbyings ci yang ma yin pa'i klong nas longs spyod
NK010(tha)028:149: rdzogs pa khro bo'i mtshan dper rang shar ba /
NK010(tha)028:150: sprul pa'i bdag nyid du phyir byung bas yab kyi
NK010(tha)028:151: phyag sor rigs lnga yab yum gyi bdag nyid chen
NK010(tha)028:152: po'i bar du bzung ba la rol pa chen po'i
NK010(tha)028:153: bde ba'i rlabs kyis dbang bskur ba'i don no //
NK010(tha)028:154: de la byug bdug brab gsum gyi tshig /
NK010(tha)028:155: lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun //
NK010(tha)028:156: zhes pa rkang gnyis rang sngags dang bcas pas nyung
NK010(tha)028:157: dkar gyis brab pa khro chung gi go tshags su
NK010(tha)028:158: bsam / rak+ta la sngags sngon du 'gro bas byug pa'i rdzas kyis bkrag dang gzi byin bskyed /
NK010(tha)028:159: ba spu'i bu ga rdo rjes gtams /
NK010(tha)028:160: ma gu la sogs kyis gu gul gyis bdug nas
NK010(tha)028:161: bgegs bsrung ba gsum la don legs par tshang ngo
NK010(tha)028:162: // de la sras mchog mngal skyes dang /
NK010(tha)028:163: khro bcu phra phyag sgong skyes /
NK010(tha)028:164: sgo ma bzhi drod gsher skyes /
NK010(tha)028:165: gsod byed rnams rdzus skyes te skye gnas bzhi ka'i
NK010(tha)028:166: bag chags sbyang ba rdo rje phur pa'i rang lugs
NK010(tha)028:167: yin no // de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum gyi srog ye shes su dbang bskur ba dang /
NK010(tha)028:168: ye shes sems dpa'i srog la lhan cig skyes pa'i
NK010(tha)028:169: ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba sogs gzhung gis go
NK010(tha)028:170: don 'phrod la / de nas khams gsum sbyang ba'i dmigs pa dang /
NK010(tha)028:171: de bzhin du ye shes sems dpa'i sgo srung rta
NK010(tha)028:172: mgrin gyis bya ba'i dgos pa'ang bskyed rim 'phro can
NK010(tha)028:173: gyi gdon bgegs bsrung ba'i slad du yin pas mthar
NK010(tha)028:174: bskyed rim gyi bya ba rdzogs nas dbang bskur rgyas
NK010(tha)028:175: gdab zin rjes rta mgrin ye shes sems dpa' la
NK010(tha)028:178: rgya dang bral ba'i zhing khams ni /
NK010(tha)028:179: chos kyi dbyings rgya chad phyogs lhung dang bral ba la btags pa'o //
NK010(tha)028:180: de yang nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi phan chod tshun chod kyi brda' ni /
NK010(tha)028:181: rtag chad kyi mtha' gnyis la btags nas /
NK010(tha)028:182: dbu ma'i lam ste gnyis ka'i mthar ma lhung bas
NK010(tha)028:183: thun mong du btags nas 'dun pa'i khyad par cung
NK010(tha)028:184: zad kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes shin tu grags
NK010(tha)028:185: pa brtan pa rang bzhin gyi gnas nas dgug tu
NK010(tha)028:186: rung zhing / gzhug bya'i rten la dam tshig sems
NK010(tha)028:187: dpa' la 'jug tu rung bas thob pa chen po'i
NK010(tha)028:189: zhes dka' 'grel gyi tshul du smos pa'ang yang steng
NK010(tha)028:190: zhabs drung pa'i ngor rig 'dzin 'jigs med gling pas
